info.title: Task System API
info.description: API for managing workspaces and users within workspaces.

400.description: Bad request. Invalid credentials or missing data.

get.summary: Get a list of benefits sections

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search query for filtering the benefits sections by title or hook

200.description: List of benefits sections fetched successfully

500.description: Internal server error. Failed to fetch benefits sections.

parameters.name: benefitsSection
parameters.description: ID of the benefits section to update

500.description: Internal server error. Failed to update benefits section.

get.summary: Get a list of benefits items

parameters.name: benefits_section_id
parameters.description: Filter by benefits section ID

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search query for filtering benefits items by text

200.description: List of benefits items fetched successfully

500.description: Internal server error. Failed to fetch benefits items.

benefits_section_id.description: The section to which the item belongs.

text.description: The text content for the benefits item.

sort_order.description: The sort order of the benefits item.

500.description: Internal server error. Failed to create benefits item.

parameters.name: benefitsItem
parameters.description: ID of the benefits item to retrieve

500.description: Internal server error. Failed to update benefits item.

parameters.name: benefitsItem
parameters.description: ID of the benefits item to delete

500.description: Internal server error. Failed to delete benefits item.
